name: poetry-fullstack
description: Full-stack Chinese Poetry Application with NestJS backend and React frontend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && docker-compose up -d && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.status: echo 'Checking application status...' && curl -s http://localhost:3000 > /dev/null && echo '✅ Backend running on http://localhost:3000' || echo '❌ Backend not running' && curl -s http://localhost:3001 > /dev/null && echo '✅ Frontend running on http://localhost:3001' || echo '❌ Frontend not running'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist
